definition: approach with an offer of sexual favors

participants.reasoning: The 'Somebody' who makes the offer, explicitly indicated by the verb frame.
The 'somebody' to whom the offer is directed, functioning as the direct object in this frame.

sememes.reasoning: This sememe specifies the explicit content of the offer, 'sexual favors', which is an inherent and distinguishing characteristic of this particular verb meaning and crucial to its semantic decomposition.
